original_title: Roy Fox, the Whispering Cornetist, and His Orchestra
overview: The Whispering Coronetist, Roy Fox and His Orchestra are broadcasting from Warner Bros. Studios and perform these three musical numbers: 1. 'Sally Of My Dreams,' 2. 'My Window of Dreams,' and 3. 'Louisiana.'
title: Roy Fox, the Whispering Cornetist, and His Orchestra
